topics.body:
For fuck sake I'm getting sick of my Computer and its constant problem with running threw my Tumblr messages.

Ever since Tumblr kept "Updating" their site my computer has just been shitting the bed everytime it goes on there.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554f5a5a6368726725860800#post_554f5a5a6368726725860800
Well, I guess it's probably too much to load. I like to think updates as "changing something to lure out bugs". So, there will be a whole lot of problems.

Also, I sent an email to Twitter about my situation. They replied but I replied back by stressing out the points they don't seem to understand.
